snippet: Cases of paralysis caused by mutating polio vaccine have been found in South Sudan and Madagascar, the World Health Organization said Friday.
abstract: World Health Organization says cases of paralysis caused by mutating polio vaccine have been found in South Sudan and Madagascar and that new rounds of vaccination will be conducted in both areas.
lead_paragraph: Cases of paralysis caused by mutating polio vaccine have been found in South Sudan and Madagascar, the World Health Organization said Friday.

headline.main: Rare Vaccine-Derived Polio Discovered in 2 Countries
headline.print_headline: Rare Vaccine-Derived Polio Discovered in 2 Countries
